Texts.Chs: 把^orange;麦芽汁和酵母水^reset;带给我。(位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;wort and yeast water^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 先制作1份^orange;酵母水^reset;。方法我已经教你了。接下来，用^orange;糖化桶^reset;把水和麦芽混合。我们需要1瓶^orange;麦芽汁^reset;。
Texts.Eng: First, make one measure of ^orange;Yeast Water^reset;. I already taught you how to do this. Next, use the ^orange;Mashing Tun^reset; to mix your malt with water. We need one flask of ^orange;Wort^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 现在我们把酿造^green;啤酒^reset;所有步骤都完成了！
Texts.Eng: Now we have everything we need to make ^green;beer^reset;, the glory of the Gods.
